com.facebook.buck.cli

Interface ArtifactCacheFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoggingArtifactCacheFactory

    public interface ArtifactCacheFactory
    Factory to create an ArtifactCache. In practice, this will likely be used as a one-time Supplier.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeCreatedArtifactCaches(int timeoutInSeconds)
      Close all instances of ArtifactCache created by the factory.
